response.name: GET a specific Question
response.body:
{
    "id": 8,
    "question_text": "Mit gondol Ön Orbán Viktorról?",
    "created_at": "2022-10-06T10:17:32.000000Z",
    "updated_at": "2022-10-10T16:25:58.000000Z",
    "number_of_votes": 7,
    "votes": [
        {
            "id": 12,
            "vote_text": "O1G",
            "number_of_votes": 0,
            "created_at": "2022-10-09T19:03:45.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2022-10-09T19:03:45.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 13,
            "vote_text": "Szerintem Gyurcsány!",
            "number_of_votes": 14,
            "created_at": "2022-10-09T19:03:57.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2022-10-10T06:34:59.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 14,
            "vote_text": "Orbán a király!",
            "number_of_votes": 0,

            "updated_at": "2022-10-09T19:04:06.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 15,
            "vote_text": "A szomszéd fűje mindig zöldebb",
            "number_of_votes": 0,
            "created_at": "2022-10-10T06:36:01.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2022-10-10T18:02:44.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 16,
            "vote_text": "Pisont István a legnagyobb c....!",

            "created_at": "2022-10-10T06:40:25.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2022-10-10T06:40:25.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 28,
            "vote_text": "Non iste dolorum officia quasi pariatur incidunt. Exercitationem similique quia aspernatur facere omnis nulla eveniet. Doloribus sunt rerum enim maiores rem aspernatur.",

            "created_at": "2022-10-12T06:39:06.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2022-10-12T06:39:06.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 39,
            "vote_text": "Ipsam magnam ea amet et quis. Harum rerum dolorem consequatur sunt eos dolor incidunt. Quia ut dolorem quis sed.",
